statements: SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM waste_reduction_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, segment_criteria FROM waste_reduction_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'Students';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, personalized_message FROM waste_reduction_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM waste_reduction_campaigns WHERE target_audience='Students';
SELECT campaign_name, personalized_message, segment_criteria FROM waste_reduction_campaigns WHERE target_audience='Families' AND campaign_name LIKE 'Spring%';
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_campaigns WHERE segment_criteria @> '{"age": 18, "location": "NY"}' ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience, personalized_message FROM waste_reduction_campaigns WHERE campaign_id='8ee9f507-17fc-418e-9597-017e9129ef1b';
SELECT DISTINCT target_audience, COUNT(*) as campaign_count FROM waste_reduction_campaigns GROUP BY target_audience HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY campaign_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM waste_reduction_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS total_participants FROM campaign_participants GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM waste_reduction_campaigns WHERE target_audience LIKE '%students%';
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM waste_reduction_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM waste_reduction_campaigns WHERE target_audience LIKE '%students%';
SELECT * FROM campaign_participants WHERE participant_name = 'Alice' OR contact_number = '1234567890';
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(*) AS total_participants FROM campaign_participants GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM waste_reduction_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM waste_reduction_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM campaign_recipients WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT recipient_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM campaign_recipients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM waste_reduction_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM waste_reduction_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31'
SELECT c.campaign_name, cr.first_name, cr.email FROM waste_reduction_campaigns c INNER JOIN campaign_recipients cr ON c.campaign_id = cr.campaign_id
SELECT rs.segment_name, rs.segment_description, cr.first_name FROM recipient_segments rs JOIN campaign_recipients cr ON rs.recipient_id = cr.recipient_id ORDER BY rs.segment_name
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_campaign;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM waste_reduction_campaign;
SELECT audience_name, age_group, region FROM target_audience;
SELECT campaign_id, engagement_rate, conversion_rate FROM campaign_results;
SELECT template_name, content FROM message_templates;
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction_campaign;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM waste_reduction_campaign WHERE campaign_name = 'Earth Day Campaign';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM waste_reduction_campaign ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, audience_name, age_group, region FROM waste_reduction_campaign JOIN target_audience ON waste_reduction_campaign.campaign_id = target_audience.campaign_id;

SELECT campaign_name, template_name, engagement_rate FROM waste_reduction_campaign JOIN message_templates ON waste_reduction_campaign.campaign_id = message_templates.template_id ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Participants WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT segment_name, criteria FROM Segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY segment_name ASC;
SELECT message_text, creation_date, sender FROM Messages WHERE sender = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT c.campaign_name, p.first_name, p.last_name FROM Campaigns c JOIN CampaignParticipants cp ON c.campaign_id = cp.campaign_id JOIN Participants p ON cp.participant_id = p.participant_id;
SELECT segment_name, COUNT(*) FROM Segments GROUP BY segment_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, m.message_text FROM Participants p LEFT JOIN Messages m ON p.email = m.sender;
